name: Love Note
description:
Love Note has your player return home from a busy day of work, only to see a note on the door. It's from your boyfriend, and it looks as if he has a surprise for you inside. Follow his trail of notes around the house and find the present he wants to share with you.

Heartseed Studios

Roles

Brett - Producer, sound

Bojian Liu (Albert) - art, design

Justin - programming, design

Kevin - programming, art
